entry.title: Robo-Advisor Introduction
entry.content: What is Robo-Advisor? Robo-advisors or Robo-advisers are a class of financial adviser that provide financial advice or portfolio management online with moderate to minimal human intervention. -Wikipedia Robo-advisor (A.K.A. Intelligent Investment) can provide automated investment management services, which requires little or low human interactions once the clients ensure their initial preferences. General Process & Mechanism of Robo-AdvisorRisk Tolerance Questionnaire (RTQ)RTQ is a questionnaire about customers’ personal financial goals and tolerance for risk. Rebalancing Process Robo provides asset allocation and investment selection. Automatic deposits from payroll, systematic investment plans, and automatic rebalancing The robo-advisor software will make periodic adjustments over time. Theories & TechniquesMordern Portfolio Theory Input: User Info; Output: Portfolio; Mean-Variance Optimization Deferential Manifold and Topology Use tensor to describe the portfolio space; Find topological invariant and predict； Deferential Manifold； Machine Learning Random effect function Reinforcement learning Finance Risk Management Mutual Fund FOF product Diversified Investment: — Passive management: mainly index fund or ETF (Exchange-Trade Funds) — Stocks, bonds, mutual funds, futures, and real estate may be used Websites about Robo Advisor nerdwallet-investing investmentzen-best robo advisor Independent Robo-Advisors (Overseas) Betterment Wealthfront Personal Capital Sigfig Vanguard Rebalance IRA WiseBanyan Wealthsimple Blooom Schwab Intelligent Portfolios Ally:TradeKing Advisor Hedgeable FutureAdvisor Motif Investing TD Ameritrade Merill Edge ETRADE Acorns Eoption tradestation InteractiveBrokers Fiedelity GO Alpha Architect Robo Cambria Digital Advisor Independent Robo-Advisors (Domestic)1 Ant Group: iGoldenBeta 招商银行：摩羯智投 金融界：灵犀智投 宜信财富：投米RA 理财魔方 蛋卷基金 平安壹账通：智能财富管家 华夏银行智能投顾 Features Optimal investment strategy to non-professional investors Customized Automation Low commission fee DisadvantagesNo too much AI&Big Data yet in the industry (Speech Recognition, Big Data) Academic Readings Moody, J., Wu, L., Liao, Y., & Saffell, M. (1998). Performance functions and reinforcement learning for trading systems and portfolios. Journal of Forecasting, 17(56), 441-470. Neuneier, R., & Mihatsch, O. (1999). Risk sensitive reinforcement learning. In Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems (pp. 1031-1037). Dempster, M. A., & Jones, C. M. (2001). A real-time adaptive trading system using genetic programming. Quantitative Finance, 1(4), 397-413. Li, B., & Hoi, S. C. (2014). Online portfolio selection: A survey. ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR), 46(3), 35. Galindo, J., & Tamayo, P. (2000). Credit risk assessment using statistical and machine learning: basic methodology and risk modeling applications. Computational Economics, 15(1), 107-143. Dempster, M. A., & Leemans, V. (2006). An automated FX trading system using adaptive reinforcement learning. Expert Systems with Applications, 30(3), 543-552. Nevmyvaka, Y., Feng, Y., & Kearns, M. (2006, June). Reinforcement learning for optimized trade execution. In Proceedings of the 23rd international conference on Machine learning (pp. 673-680). ACM. Jiang, Z., & Liang, J. (2016). Cryptocurrency Portfolio Management with Deep Reinforcement Learning. arXiv preprint arXiv:1612.01277. Moody, J. E., Saffell, M., Liao, Y., & Wu, L. (1998, August). Reinforcement Learning for Trading Systems and Portfolios. In KDD (pp. 279-283). Non-academic Readings ACCENTURE: The Rise of Robo-Advice: Changing the Concept of Wealth Management CGI: [Beyond Robo-Advisors:Using Technology to Power New Methods of Client Advice and Interaction] Deloitte: Robo-Advisory in Wealth Management IPSOS: Robo-advisors: the rise of automated financial advice McKinsey & Company: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE THE NEXT DIGITAL FRONTIER? Wealthfront Investment: Methodology White Paper Betterment - White Paper: Tax Loss Harvesting+™ Schwab - Rebalancing and Tax-Loss Harvesting in Schwab Intelligent Portfolios™ Casual Readings 知乎：智能投顾是什么？「智能」体现在哪些方面？ 一文读懂智能投顾的商业逻辑和模型算法 知乎：什么是智能投顾？ 华尔街见闻：智能投顾是怎样炼成的？ 知乎LIVE:智能投顾是什么？ CNBC: Goldman building robo-adviser to give investment advice to the masses CNBC: Machine learning is transforming investment strategies for asset managers American Banker: Beyond Robo-Advisers: How AI Could Rewire Wealth Management The Economist: Ask the algorithm Quora: Is there any hedge fund using Machine learning based algorithms for trading? Quora: Can deep reinforcement learning be used to make automated trading better? INSIGHT: Machine Learning in Finance: Is a Robo-Advisor Smart Enough to Invest Your Savings? NerdWallet: Best Robo-Advisors: 2017 Top Picks INVESTOPEDIA: 9 Top Robo-Advisors for Financial Advisors StackExchange:Which algorithms do robo-advisors use? Mr Money Mustache Blog: The Betterment Experiment – Results NerdWallet: Best Online Brokers for Stock Trading 2017 The Balance: A Look at the Top Robo-Advisor Services Artificial Intelligence led disruption in Trading Possible Topics Survey of Robo-Advisor Market and its impact Survey: How do human trust Robo-Advisor? Trend analysis of Robot-Advisor Portfolio Management view of Robo-Advisor In-depth exploration of Robo-Advisor framework 1. 中国智能投顾行业2017年8月发展月报 ↩

entry.title: My Self-Study Plan
entry.content: I hope that I could accomplish these goals on time. Good luck! 1. 机器学习CoursesMain stream Basics:CMU:CS229 Machine Learning by Andrew Ng NLP: CS224d: Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing Information Retrieval: Introduction to Information Retrieval Information Theory: Course on Information Theory, Pattern Recognition, and Neural Networks (David MacKay, University of Cambridge) Deep Learning: CS231N - Convolutional Neural Networks Deep Learning: Neural Networks and Deep Learning - Andrew Ng, deeplearning.ai (Coursera) Machine Learning for Trading | Udacity Machine Learning - Recommender systems 知识管理 社会计算、社会物理学、金融物理、金融数学 OthersHarvard:CS109 Data ScienceMaterials of CS-449: Neural Networks (Willamette University)Coursera:Data Science 专项课程CMU:Statistical Machine LearningFastML: Machine Learning made easyVideolecture net：Machine learningDataschool:In-depth introduction to machine learning in 15 hours of expert videosCourseReport: Learn Data Science at These 22 Bootcamps BooksIntro to AI AI by Ruseull Machine Learning Bishop MLAPP MLAPP Code ML in Python 西瓜书 机器学习(周志华西瓜书) 参考答案 总目录 機器學習：使用Python Deep Learning:Deep Learning: An MIT Press book 推荐系统： 推荐系统实践 by 项亮 Recommendation System Handbook 自然语言处理统计自然语言处理（第2版）by 宗成庆 课外读物推荐终极算法 ProjectsTutorials and Projects To Help You：Learn and Apply Machine Learning – Fast!Thisismetis: DATA SCIENCE TRAININGDATAQUEST:Learn real-world data science skills 数据爬取工具Python Scrapy下载地址, 安装及使用步骤, 操纵指南 （2）NITK自然语言处理的Python开源工具相关工具包和教程可下载中文使用介绍, 有助于了解各个包的意思和作用的链接 zhihu-python：获取知乎信息介绍：zhihu-python 采用 Python2.7 编写，用来方便地获取知乎上各种内容的信息，并且可以方便地将答案备份导出为 txt 或 markdown 文件。由于知乎官方目前没有提供 api，所以有了此项目的存在。使用 Python3 的类似项目可以参见：zhihu-py3 。使用 PHP 的类似项目可以参见：zhihu-php 。使用 Go 的类似项目可以参见：zhihu-go 。 List of listMachine Learning Category on VideoLectures.NetA Tour of Machine Learning Algorithms机器学习入门资源不完全汇总（tang_Kaka_back@新浪微博）机器学习(Machine Learning)&深度学习(Deep Learning)资料(Chapter 1)机器学习(Machine Learning)&深度学习(Deep Learning)资料(Chapter 2) Notes深度开源OPEN经验：机器学习(Machine Learning)&深度学习(Deep Learning)资料[转]机器学习入门 Blog & Website中文[转]机器学习经典书籍廖雪峰的官方网站数据科学中的R和Python学飞 从坠落开始 博客统计之都哈工大电子健康研究所：郭熙铜 推荐系统论坛武汉大学信息管理学院：曾子明推荐系统常用的推荐算法Microsoft-Social Computing (Asia)清华大学自然语言处理与社会人文计算实验室中国人民大学：网络与移动数据管理实验室 EnglishProfessor Di Cook, Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics, Monash UniR-blogger: R news and tutorials contributed by (580) R bloggerswordpress: -Nest generation BI Andrew Patton’s MATLAB code page: This page contains some of the MATLAB code I’ve written during the course of my research. If you find any mistakes or bugs in the code please let me know.This code is being released under a BSD license, which means that you can do pretty much what ever you want with it, including make money by selling it. DatatauBlog of Sebastian Ruder: I’m a PhD student in Natural Language Processing and a research scientist at AYLIEN. I blog about Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, and startups. 2. 统计Books ISLR ESL by Hastie 统计学习 by 李航 IPSUR Courses3. 复习数学相关Courses最优化 Stanford:EE364a: Convex Optimization I Data structure and algorithmsMIT:Introduction to Algorithms Books4. Information SystemBooks Decision Support System Decision theory network optimization control theory： Stichastic Control Theory Operation Research 5. Github/hexo/markdown等

entry.title: Lecture notes of CUHK-DSME6622
entry.content: Bullet PointsAdvanced MIS Research Seminar Proposal each course (10 min each); There is reading list; About Econometric of IS; How to design experiments: Experiment EC 9A3 Advanced Econometric Theory - Lecture Slides CrossValidation:Difference-in-difference-in-differences estimator COS Analysis? Baseline? Randomization ~ statistical test 断点回归？计量经济学？ Theoretical Modeling vs behavior vs experiment vs empirical How do we identify the way we want to ~ social psychology ~ mental map impact of technology ~ topic is moving on ~ some of the topics are already understood ~ do good literature review treatment? ~ control? ~ outcome DID ~ before & after treatment, well controlled PresentationFirefox extensions update classification by Luo Dan Firefox web browser (open suourse platform)~ extentions or add-ons Classification : open or close sourse Mechanism? ~ size or role of users output: influence : positive or negative rapid release strategy vs traditional way cross? experimental design whether the add-on supplier update their products in response to the rapid release of Firefox platform? 1 observation: add-on version number? Review/online experiment by treatment: hit of newest review / high-quality control : no review social psychology ~ ab test? ~ online experiment Economic analysis of social interactions Charles F.Manski, Journal of Economic emperical analysis mutually exclusive but cllectively exhaustive 3 effects Pay NOT to “go to the gym” by Ivy consumer behavior -> maximize utility (rational expectation vs irrational) theoretical prediction & empirical testing & survey behaviour IO Personal view: How to quantify the utility function? not like financial product: stock, bond or derivatives, the utility of going to gym should also include non-economic factor (price), such as the potential chance of keeping the right of going to gym Observational Learning: Evidence from a Randomized Natural Field Experiment One restaurant: whether the randomization is not good enough? Control group: pre-experiment data, one week Raking treatment table vs salience treatment table One week data DDD Coincidence, observational learning (learn the quality, more about yourself), conformity (more from others), compliance, salience The Spread of Behavior in an Online Social Network Experiment * Small world network model Network vs photonic?? Social reinforcement

entry.title: Undergraduate Notes 1
entry.content: Poisson bracket\\{ f ,g \\} =\sum_{i=1}^{N}(\frac{\partial f}{\partial q_i} \frac{\partial g}{\partial p_i} -\frac{\partial f}{\partial p_i} \frac{\partial g}{\partial q_i} )Primality testCompositeness test test if n is divisible by 2 or 3; check through all the numbers from $6k\pm1 \leq \sqrt{n}$ Primorial (素乘) $\longleftrightarrow$ prime Just like factorial (阶乘) $\longleftrightarrow$ factor $nth$ prime number $P_n$ : P_n \\# = \prod_{k=1}^{n} p_kin which $p_k$ is the kth prime number. (e.g., $ P_5 \# = 2 \times 3 \times 5 \times 7 \times 11 = 2310 $) $P_0 \# = 1 \Rightarrow P_n \# = e^{(1+o(1))n \log n}$, in which $o(\cdot)$ is the little -o notation Big-o notaion eg: $f(x)=6 x^4 - 2 x^3 + 5$, $f(x) = O(x^4)$ Simplification rules: If f(x) is a sum of several terms, the one with the largest growth rate is kept, and all others omitted If f(x) is a product of several factors, any constants terms in the product that do not depend on x are omitted. 关于在Markdown中输入数学公式Markdown中插入数学公式的方法使用 Markdown + MathJax 在博客里插入数学公式
